description:
Adds a costume for the Servant Miyamoto Musashi.

Note:
Costumes can be changed by selecting "Change Clothing" from the Bookshelf in the house. You must first meet the aforementioned character in the story.
Added as a pre-order bonus for players who purchased the game up until and including September 28th, 2023.
This content may become available for free or for purchase separately at a later date.
name: Bonus Costume: Phantasmal Dress "Miyamoto Musashi"
